NewRR\(.*\)
testRR\(.*\)
^.*(?:\s|\\t)+(?:APL|LOC|TXT|MX|DNSKEY|PX|SOA|SO|IN|CH|SSHFP)(?:\s|\\t)+.*$
^\s*(?:Mbox|Signature|Algorithm|Prime[12]|Modulus|Coefficient|PrivateExponent|Exponent[12]|PublicExponent|PrivateKey|NextDomain):.*$
"[0-9a-f]{4,}"
"[0-9A-F]{4,}"
^\s*[0-9a-f]{4,}$
(?:Signature|PublicKey) !?= ".*"
TsigGenerate\(m, ".*"
tkeyStr.*
^[a-zA-Z=;,/0-9+-]{64}$
^[a-zA-Z=;,/0-9+-]{72}$
^\s*[a-zA-Z=;,/0-9+-]{59}$
# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\g{-1}{3,}\b
